item.title: I need help with range items
item.dc:creator: @teric6 teric6
item.description:
@teric6 wrote:

i know hpw to add funky specials to them, well

open up your client.java and search for

// bows

or

//whip

then at the end of that code add this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 830) // rune javelin { staticAnimation(601, absX, absY, 100); staticAnimation(444, absX, absY, 100); setAnimation(1331); actionTimer = 25; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; return 741; }

Then press enter and add this

if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 868) // rune knife { staticAnimation(456, absX, absY, 100); staticAnimation(456, absX, absY, 100); setAnimation(1331); actionTimer = 25; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; return 423; }

It’ll Add something cool to them, compile it and try it out

Read full topic
